website_summaries.verdict: A highly capable device that can see, hear, and detect movement.
pros: Looks and feels expensive and performs as nicely as it appears
Alerts parents based on both noise and movement detection
12 infrared lights for ultra-clear night vision
Customers especially appreciate the quality of video and sound

customer_reviews.title: Loses connection with NO indication. Terrible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The connection gets lost without notifying you so that multiple times in the last month I’m being woken to my baby screaming for me to hear her through the walls while the unit appeared to be working fine but had no connection. This just happened for the last time and I returned the product
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Will not connect at times. Frustrating. Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this because of the quality and the idea, The picture and sound were great. It Just wasn’t reliable. It would say connecting to camera....and never connect a few times. Especially with my husbands phone, nanny’s phone and our iPad. Which was very frustrating. It would connect after being reset, which I had to do 3 times during the month which is a pain. We ended up going with a cheaper WiFi camera with great reviews and the connection is so much faster and more reliable. Read the reviews on the Apple store for safety 1st, I wish I would have done that before I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this product but now extremely disappointed biggest problem - our phones/apps were never able to connect to the camera or audio, all we saw was a blurry screen so the product was not usable things I could of lived with if the camera connected and the video/audio quality was good - while the setup process is straightforward, it takes way too long and multiple attempts - doesn’t come with an adapter for the audio parent unit so unless you have one lying around your kind of out luck - would have preferred if the camera was wireless rather than having to manage wires up a wall
customer_reviews.author: Jen G

customer_reviews.title: Great thoughts, failed product
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so unreliable. A day after I got it, the audio unit stopped lighting up when there is motion or noise. It’s so sporadic; sometimes it lights up, other times it does not. The connectivity is super unreliable and I know it’s not my WiFi because I have no problem connecting anything else. The picture quality isn’t $200 quality. I spent $35 on a WiFi camera and got much better quality. The problem I’m having now is that my nanny and husband can’t view anything. Why advertise that you can add people to view and it’s not fully functional? Easy install, and great in theory—it’s just not ready to be distributed. I’ll be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: This monitor and it’s app are unreliable. It’s a shame because the video picture is great but several times in the course of each night I would not receive notifications for events that showed on the recordings. The audio unit is straight up useless. The app also goes down randomly leaving you with no access to view your camera and no notifications of baby motion or sound events. You are not notified when the app goes down so you don’t even know that the monitor is not working at the time. Completely useless product for its purpose of keeping an eye on an infant.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Slow and unacceptable latency, even in good network connections.
customer_reviews.text: The predicted worked ok for the first few months, but the responsiveness and latency of the connection progressively gets worse. It is now gotten to the point where our baby has had to scream in tears before we hear him without any warning from the monitor. Other solutions work much better.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: The picture is clear and beautiful, it's really nice to be able to access it via our mobiles (we both connected, and it worked perfectly). I'm also happy we got the audio unit, as the light indication is really helpful during the night. The camera and the app are super easy to setup; the audio unit took me a bit of a longer while, but once it was connected it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Shira

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect, but not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I really really like this baby monitor. The video quality is great. Ease of use is great. I love the "audio unit" concept. The price is very reasonable. The app works in audio only mode. There are many cons. However, in my experience it has not been reliable. On several occasions the audio unit has not worked. The light will be a solid blue, my baby will be crying, but I will not hear noise over the audio unit. The status colors are a little confusing and I could not find a clear explanation. Overall, I do really like this video monitor. I just can't use it for my child's bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: cannot connect if youhave dual band router which is most common in these days .
customer_reviews.text: video has trouble connecting reliably if you have dual band router. does clarify that.description is deceptive and does not clarify these details Buyers Beware .do not buy unless you have single band 2.4 ghz router as stated by tech support. waste of time trying to configure. Todays technology is towards dual band routers but this software is behind the times in technology.
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great when it works which is basically never. Video won't load majority of the time and it constantly connects and disconnects. Notifications due to that issue were so bad my phone was going off every 5 minutes. The smart audio unit might as well be a paper weight or use it as a hockey puck. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these cameras. One of them works perfectly well the other worked for a couple months and then won’t pair. The red light just came on one day and nothing I do to troubleshoot. I have made several attempts at contacting customer service to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mah

customer_reviews.title: Good Wi-Fi Monitor
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing about this monitor, and my husbands, is the WI-FI capability. My husband loves that he can check in on her while he's on his lunch break. I love that I can share the video camera connection with family members so they can check in and see my daughter whenever they want. Also, the audio unit is so good I could sometimes here sounds from the room next door. Luckily, u can control the sensitivity levels of the camera and audio unit. What I didn't like was not having an LCD screen that connected to the camera without needing WI-FI capabilities. We sometimes go camping so at times I couldn't check up on my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: It works for what it’s intended
customer_reviews.text: Well starting off the box looked to be opened so I was a little hesitant going into it. The picture quality is good, sounds is alright. The one advantage this one offers over competitors is the separate continuous audio monitoring disc. It’s not constantly on your phone draining your battery and grandma can use it. We still might return it but for now it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E

customer_reviews.title: Baby monitor with audio
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been struggling with finding a good baby monitor for my two kids. A friend recommended this baby monitor so I figured I would give it a try. I like that I can have both visual as well as a good audio. Downside is that I have to use my phone to view the image instead of having an actual device to look at. Sometimes in the middle of the night I just want to quickly glance at the monitor and know that my kids are okay. With that said, at least that means I can remotely check on my kids if I’m not home with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Duong

customer_reviews.title: Sound never connected and video quality was bad
customer_reviews.text: When we received the device, we set it up immediately. The portable audio device never connected to the camera. When we followed the instructions to “factory reset” it, it completely shut down and nothing would turn back on. Since we spent so much money on it, we tried to use just the camera and listen for our son’s sounds through the app on our phones. The video kept going online and offline over and over again. The video quality was blurry and the sound constantly echoed. We were very unhappy with our purchase. We are returning it and buying something much better.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Bottoms

customer_reviews.title: Get a different monitor
customer_reviews.text: I hate this baby monitor. It constantly goes offline and sends alerts when nothing is happening yet won’t alert when the baby is moving. I wanted it for the convenience of being on my phone but it sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Clear Photo and Sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Safety 1st Wi-Fi Baby Monitor because our previous monitor's signal didn't reach across our house. This was the perfect replacement so we could use the wi-fi feature and no go out of range, even if I was sitting outside. I love being able to have my baby in his room for nap time while playing with my older child in the back yard and have the comfort of knowing he's okay. Set up was very simple and it was easy to connect to our in home internet. The picture and sound are very clear. This is our 3rd baby monitor through 2 kids and by far my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: WSummers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality and both parents can use the camera once you download the Safety First app. I really like that you can zoom in just by “pinching” the phone screen. You can check the baby monitor anywhere which a great way to check up on things without texting your babysitter a million times. The camera was a little difficult to set up, but customer service was happy to help us troubleshoot. This is a great product overall and we are very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this! It comes with no instructions, you have to download an app to use it with. The app sends you hundreds of notifications for every little peep. The video quality is blurry, the sound quality is not very loud. Don't waste your money on this fancy gadget when traditional monitors work way better.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Given to a Friend for Baby Shower
customer_reviews.text: No complaints from the friend. She had really been wanting this for her baby and was excited to receive it. No complaints afterward, but I purchased the warranty, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Horrible piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is a piece of junk!!!! My baby cried throughout the night and it didn’t not pick up her cries once. I’m very upset with this please don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Clabough

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and awesome video footage
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this baby monitor. I never had a video one before with my two LOs but decided I wanted one for our third baby. It has been awesome to watch him, see his movements, take photographs, and be able to talk to him. It has all of the features I would want in a video monitor and is all from the comfort of my phone and parent audio unit. They are very user friendly, lightweight, and excellent technology. I highly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: ESF Food Pantry

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: We love this monitor! The picture quality is great and it’s amazing to be able to check in from anywhere we are. The wide angle gives the ability to see the whole room without planning or tilting which is so nice. One of my favorite features is the 24 hour timeline! It’s fun to see what’s been happening.
customer_reviews.author: Amy33

customer_reviews.title: Excellent video quality
customer_reviews.text: The video has excellent video quality, I can see if my baby's eyes are open or closed. The night vision is also excellent, can see clearly what is going on. The product was easy to set up right out of the box. The audio unit is useful when I don't want to stream with my phone. I like the recorded baby moments, it's funny to watch! Major tip: make sure your wifi is awesome, otherwise there would be delays connecting to the camera or it dropping in and out. Will be using this product for years to come! Thank you Safety1st for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Ray Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and audio
customer_reviews.text: I love that this connects to my phone and has a separate audio unit. The audio unit activated when the baby cries and allows me to wake up at night without having the app open on my phone 100% of the time. And the audio unit is chargeable so we bring it outside with us when the baby is napping. I rarely even use the video function except to just check on him.
customer_reviews.author: Kellz7923

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I absolutely love this monitor. It's incredibly easy to install and very user-friendly. The video quality is amazing, and the camera lens is wide. You are able to get a much clearer, more defined picture with this camera than any other monitor that I've seen. We purchased both the camera and the sound and movement unit, and I love that it records motion and sound events. It's also incredibly convenient that you can check it from anywhere, as long as you have a phone. I would absolutely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: StinoB

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and install!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is perfect for all our needs. We can watch our son for sleeping, playing, and it's great for communicating back and forth. And, when we leave the house, it's easy to move to see what the dog is up to all day - and if he get's in trouble, you can tell him to stop. We will use it as a security camera on our next vacation as well. The motion or sound activation feature helps you keep an eye on things since it sends alerts to your phone directly. It's super easy to set-up and become a pro in no time. I'd give it more than five stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Ina

customer_reviews.title: Shop around, too much technology to fail.
customer_reviews.text: We are unhappy with this product. The audio unit only works about half the time. It will say it’s connected, but will only work intermittently. The app isn’t the greatest, could use some refining. The only way we feel comfortable leaving kiddo in another room at night, is knowing that the monitor will work, this one isn’t consistent enough. 3/5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What an AMAZING product and experience with this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: The out of box experience for this product was just truly a treat! You can tell that this company took the time to think through the packaging. The installation process was very easy and connected to my android pixel 3 very easily. The quality of the video and audio is just amazing to be honest. It is crisp and having the feature to talk back really helps. I would highly recommend everyone buy this product because the other brands out there like VTech or Cocoon will not give you the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work. Very unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. We have amazing internet throughout our entire house but even still this camera can’t consistently stay connected to the internet. What good is a baby monitor if you don’t even know if it’s working at night. Highly recommend against this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: A solid product with a good app
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed using this product! My wife and I have a different baby monitor we use for overnight in the nursery, but we like using this around the house and in other rooms. The recording feature is also very clear, so we are also considering using it for home security. Although, we tried using the smart audio unit, we no longer use it and only use the online camera/audio feature through our phone. Overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Heckman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality that provides comfort!
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased Safety first WiFi video monitor. We have a very active sleeper and we were having to check on her several times through the night, which would actually disturb her more. The video monitor allows us to see that she is safe and comfortable and provides us comfort without disturbing her, which allows Mom and Dad to sleep better! The picture quality is fantastic! We did have a little trouble connecting to the WiFi at first but we were able to troubleshoot the issue. We are very happy with our purchase and would recommend it to new parents!
customer_reviews.author: Norah Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Design & Easy Set Up
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use for our 2nd child, already have a Nest Cam set up in our toddler's room. We chose this one for Baby #2 because of the audio unit that allows us to listen to baby without having to have the app up on our phones. PROS: Very easy set-up, sleek design, records 'baby moments' that are easy to view, can take a picture of what the camera sees in the app CONS: have experienced some delays in camera feed but could be due to location of camera being far from wifi router
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, only works 30% of time.
customer_reviews.text: Love it when it actually works. It takes forever to connect. Not sure why, have strong cellular signal and am connected to home WiFi with excellent connection but sometimes it take forever to connect and sometimes it doesn’t connect at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kat D

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awful. Rarely connects to WiFi and when it does the picture lags. Would NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A must own for all parents
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this so much! Because of this camera I can secretly watch my daughter sleep while I’m at work because I’m a mess when I’m away from her.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: There is a constant static sound that emits from the camera when it’s on. It wakes my baby up whenever we use it, which totally defeats the purpose. Yes the night vision is good and the picture quality is good but the constant crackling static sound and high pitch buzz make this product useless. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: alan r tubbs

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: This product is not easy to use. You must have internet capability to use. Basically 2.4!
customer_reviews.author: Glynis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and setup.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I really like this baby monitor. It is super easy to use and setup. The free app works well with our Samsung phones. I like how you can adjust the sensitivity for sound and motion with notifications. It really gives us a peace of mind when our baby is sleeping. The 30 sec video clips are pretty cool too!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Askins

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating device
customer_reviews.text: The camera has a nice picture but the set up for the audio unit is frustrating. It constantly did not want to connect to the sound base. Camera works well but the set up has its flaws and frustrations.

customer_reviews.title: $200 for junk
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk. Takes forever to connect, and when it does, it will either lose its ability to transmit sound or just go black. I will be returning this item shortly. Do not waste your cash. Just buy a one way sound monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Parker

customer_reviews.title: video monitor done right
customer_reviews.text: Video monitors have come a long way since boy number 1 - you can now see what you wanted to all along. The app guides you through an easy setup. Video quality is excellent. Night vision is also amazing. The app works on the iPad even though it’s technically an iPhone app. It’s slower to connect when using older apple products that are limited to earlier iOS, but they’re many years old now. Sensitivity is adjustable for movement and sound, or turn off notifications altogether. A great monitor.
customer_reviews.author: 3boyDad

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Is been only a year I purchased this camara for my baby and out nothing stop working and connecting to internet i contact the company and they don’t help me or give me any type of solution really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Johana M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor!
customer_reviews.text: We love this monitor! It's easy to install and sync with the app. (I have an android phone and it works great.) Love how we can see our kids clearly, zoom in and scan the room, and do it all from our phones! This is such an improvement over our old monitor, and we love it! It's especially great to be able to check on the kids from anywhere if we have a sitter or just want to peek in on them. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: High quality resolution
customer_reviews.text: Set this up and was impressed by the high quality of the video! Even in low light the video is solid. The camera is solid and has a solid feel to it. As does the audio receiver. Would be great to have an off button/mode.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Not has happy as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I am not happy with this product but missed my return window. I am just now using this product more now that my son is in his own room. The speaker does not always work or turn on and there is always static when I have the video on.
customer_reviews.author: melina

customer_reviews.title: Works only at your home
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, I have been using it with my son since he was born and now he is almost 9months and works excelente. The only down side, It only works at our house. We went to my in-laws house for a weekend and we couldn’t use it because it’s setup with our house’s WiFi
customer_reviews.author: yohana

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and clear!
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving the convenience and ease of this Safety 1st WiFi monitor. The picture quality is crisp and clear and the camera provides a wide view of where my baby is sleeping. It's great for travel as it can be connected anywhere there is WiFi. The audio/movement detector provides added piece of mind if you are not looking at your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality isn’t the best, it’s constantly going offline and it’s not in real time it’s really slow. I wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works great, very clear, doesn’t travel well
customer_reviews.text: Works well in one location but does not travel well. Going to different locations with same WiFi works ok but does need to stay plugged in. Picture and video is very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Rejani Nedumchira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift that was registered for and they love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor! This is the third monitor I have purchased and is by far my favorite! Easy to use and setup. Love the wide views, clear picture and great range (unlike my last 2 from Motorola). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Account login problems
customer_reviews.text: Unable to log into iPhone app after setting up account. Also problems logging into account with browser consistently. Not new to technology. Been doing IT support for 15 years. No opinions on how well the device works. Didn't get that far.
customer_reviews.author: Ned Schumann

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product but the main function i bought it for was for the camera function and I cannot even use it. I will be returning the product. Until they fix the bugs in the app, I would not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Schrader

customer_reviews.title: This aint your grandmothers baby monitor !
customer_reviews.text: Install was a breeze, the video quality is awesome and the separate speaker is a nice bonus when i don't want to use it with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Greeley

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend. Wish I could return.
customer_reviews.text: Set up is very difficult. And it constantly loses connection and you have to reset the whole system. There are significant lags when opening the app to check the feed.
customer_reviews.author: KateSmyly

customer_reviews.title: Video offline
customer_reviews.text: I liked this monitor for a very short period of time. Like other customers, I’ve had to go through the set up repeatedly due to the video going offline. Definitely not worth spending the money on this product. It’s worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Grider

customer_reviews.title: Great Baby Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my friend. They used it to look after the baby when they go to work. It's easy to use and they can view their baby at work now. Very good picture quality and the set up is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great. I love that it notifies you if there is sound or movement coming from the room and that you can see previous moments.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Turcios

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is pretty bad. You can definitely tell what you’re looking at but with the tech out today, they really dropped the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not typical of Safety First
customer_reviews.text: The camera will not stay connected. The Smart Audio Unit won’t even cut on! I’m in the process of contacting Safety First about returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this monitor and love it so far! Super easy to set up and use. I love that I can check in on things while I’m out of the house:). Quality is good and doesn’t seem to glitch out ever with sound. Very happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: jenny hankins

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can check in on my baby even on my phone. The picture quality is great too
customer_reviews.author: Arnisa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup - and works great! I really like the ability to adjust the motion levels. Nice wide angle view and the picture it crystal clear. Does exactly what is says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Very clear picture. Sends alerts to my phone for noise or movement changes in the room. I love being able to check on this when I’m Not at home.
customer_reviews.author: Milton customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and love it! Super easy to set up and picture quality is great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Grau

customer_reviews.title: The video quality is fine. However
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the base doesn't work. The video quality is fine. However, the sync speed is really SLOW. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Neo mom

customer_reviews.title: This camera doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This camera doesn’t work in Colombia, the information on website doesn’t say anything about the frequency require.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Carreno

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unreliable, I will be returning. Does not stay connected to WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: lori barum

customer_reviews.title: You have to have good WiFi
customer_reviews.text: You have to make sure you have good WiFi before purchasing. We have bad WiFi and so it constantly freezes or turns off
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Baby camera
customer_reviews.text: Horrible buy, the camera takes forever to load and doesn’t stay connected
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product...easy set-up. Works very well with clear sound. Love that I can access the video from my phone. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sm

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Takes forever to connect. App works or doesn’t work-same with sound.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Coulter

customer_reviews.title: I can keep an eye on my grandchildren without waking them up!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product. Easy set up out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, but wish it had a separate video monitor
customer_reviews.text: I really like the monitor, but don’t love how it only runs off of WiFi. A lot of times I am opening the app and it buffers for a while or won’t connect at all if my husband is also logged onto the app. Also, I would love a portable monitor so I don’t have to solely rely on my phone. Overall, I think the camera is great, but I dont think it’s totally dependable for a younger baby/toodler.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Maidenberg

product_meta.title: Safety 1st HD Wi-Fi Baby Monitor Camera with Sound- and Movement-Detecting Audio Unit
product_meta.description: Stay connected with your baby wherever you go with the Safety 1st HD Wi-Fi Baby Monitor Camera with Sound- and Movement-Detecting Audio Unit. Use your smartphone to see and hear your baby no matter where you are. Safety 1st's free app allows you to adjust sound and motion sensitivity levels, set custom alerts, and much more. The video baby monitor camera provides crystal-clear 720p HD video with minimal buffering and a 130-degree wide-angle view. A smart audio unit in the baby monitor camera is sound and motion activated and provides two-way talk with a 12-hour battery life. The baby monitor features a built-in security chip that creates a firewall between the camera and your home network for an added level of privacy and security. Record special moments from the Wi-Fi baby monitor using the app and share with family and friends via text or social media. Additional baby monitor features include 12 infrared lights for ultra-clear night vision, multi-camera expandability, and encrypted cloud storage for video and sound. Safety 1st believes parenting should have fewer worries and more joyful moments. As the first and only leader in child safety, Safety 1st is here to give you peace of mind so you can spend less time worrying and more time enjoying every first you experience with your child. Troubleshoot-check the wifi signal strength from your internet service provider. To avoid signal interference or echoes ensure that there is enough distance between your device and the camera. Use of other 2.4 ghz products such as bluetooth systems or microwave ovens may cause interference with this product. Avoid placement near major electrical equipment, large metal or concrete objects or walls. Keep the camera at least 5 feet away from these types of products or turn them off if they appear to be causing interference
feature_bullets: Use your smartphone to see and hear your baby no matter where you are. Safety 1st's free app allows you to adjust sound and motion sensitivity levels, set custom alerts, and much more
The camera provides crystal-clear 720p HD video with minimal buffering and a 130-degree wide-angle view
A smart audio unit in the camera is sound and motion activated and provides two-way talk with a 12-hour battery life. Up to 15 feet infrared ultra-clear night vision
A built-in security chip creates a firewall between the camera and your home network for an added level of privacy and security
Record special moments using the app and share with family and friends via text or social media
Additional features include 12 infrared lights for ultra-clear night vision, multi-camera expandability, and encrypted cloud storage for video and sound
Safety 1st believes parenting should have fewer worries and more joyful moments so you enjoy every “first” your child experiences
